
#### Data

This data shows the numerous bird species counted by the 
birdwatchers in Hamilton area of Ontario, every year since
Christmas 1921.
The raw data is from https://www.birdscanada.org/ while 
the data source is from *"https://github.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/tree/master/data/2019/2019-06-18")"*

#### Purpose

The purpose of the app is to:

1. Compare the most birds counted.
2. show the trend of birds counted per hour.
3. study the most number of birds watched since 1921.
4. To analyse if the number of birds watched increases as number 
   of hours increases.
